isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - INSTALL - DRIVER AND PASSENGER SIDE KICK PANEL

svcproc.title: DRIVER AND PASSENGER SIDE KICK PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Remove Driver Side Kick Panel on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 94
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Slide driver side kick panel (Item 2) under forward portion of cab door opening scuff plate and position properly against side wall of cab.

caution.para: Assure air supply line is routed above kick plate mounting point for hex flanged bolt (Item 4) so it does not get pinched.

step1.para: Position back of driver side kick panel (Item 2) in place and install one hex flanged head bolt (Item 4) and tighten.
Install one hex flanged head bolt (Item 3) through side of driver side kick panel (Item 2) and tighten.
Install one pan head torx screw (Item 1) through top of driver side kick panel (Item 2) and tighten.

svcsubproc.title: Install Passenger Side Kick Panel on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 94
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Slide passenger side kick panel (Item 10) under forward portion of cab door opening scuff plate and position properly against side wall of cab.
Install one hex flanged head bolt (Item 9) through side of passenger side kick panel (Item 10) and tighten.
